page.title: 19 LIVING IN ROCK FERRY
page.content: {Housing}is very mixed,{tower blocks, {flats, semi detached}but mainly {terraced houses. }The latter leads to a very close community, where grandparents and parents live in close proximity. As one child commented':_ "Most of my family live in Rock Ferry, my nana and grandad, my aunties and a few relatives. It's also nice to have your friends close by". Family life is close and people find it is a good {central spot for visiting. North {Wales, New Brighton and Southport being favourite weekend visiting spots, while{Livepool and Birkenhead provide more than adequate facilities for{shopping and leisure. }Rock Ferry itself is an area of small shops,but unfortunately many of them have closed down for economic reasons. There is much unemployment and poverty.
